languages.text: {n}Голоса смолкают на несколько мгновений.{/n} "Если ты останешься один... взмолись к нам. Вог'Хайг отныне и навсегда — в твоей крови".
{n}The voices fall silent for a brief moment.{/n} "If you find yourself alone... beseech us. Vog'Haik is hereby and forever in your blood."
languages.original_text: {n}Голоса смолкают на несколько мгновений.{/n} "Если ты останешься один... взмолись к нам. Вог'Хайг отныне и навсегда — в твоей крови".

traits.locale_text: {n}Voices fall quiet for a brief moment.{/n} "If you find yourself alone... address your pleading to us. Vog'Hige is hereby and forever in your blood."
{n}Voices fall quiet for a brief moment.{/n} "If you find yourself alone... address your pleading to us. Vog'Hige is hereby and forever in your blood."
{n}The voices fall silent for a brief moment.{/n} "If you find yourself alone... beseech us. Vog'Hige is hereby and forever in your blood."
{n}The voices fall silent for a brief moment.{/n} "If you find yourself alone... beseech us. Vog'Hige is hereby and forever in your blood."
{n}The voices fall silent for a brief moment.{/n} "If you find yourself alone... beseech us. Vog'Haik is hereby and forever in your blood."

languages.text: {n}那些声音短暂地安静了一阵子。{/n}“如果你发现自己孤身一人……向我们祈祷吧，沃格-希杰将永远流淌在你的血脉之中。”
languages.original_text: {n}The voices fall silent for a brief moment.{/n} "If you find yourself alone... beseech us. Vog'Haik is hereby and forever in your blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}那些声音短暂地安静了一阵子。{/n}“如果你发现自己孤身一人……向我们祈祷吧，沃格-希杰将永远流淌在你的血脉之中。”

languages.text: {n}Les voix restent silencieuses un instant avant de répondre :{/n} « Si, un jour, vous vous retrouvez {mf|seul|seule}... conjurez-nous. Vog'Haik est à jamais dans votre sang. »
languages.original_text: {n}The voices fall silent for a brief moment.{/n} "If you find yourself alone... beseech us. Vog'Haik is hereby and forever in your blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les voix restent silencieuses un instant avant de répondre :{/n} « Si, un jour, vous vous retrouvez {mf|seul|seule}... conjurez-nous. Vog'Haik est à jamais dans votre sang. »

languages.text: {n}声が一時静かになる。{/n}「もし一人になったときは…我らに懇願するがいい。ヴォッグとハイクは永遠にお前の血の中にいる」
languages.original_text: {n}The voices fall silent for a brief moment.{/n} "If you find yourself alone... beseech us. Vog'Haik is hereby and forever in your blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}声が一時静かになる。{/n}「もし一人になったときは…我らに懇願するがいい。ヴォッグとハイクは永遠にお前の血の中にいる」

languages.text: {n}Las voces guardan silencio por un momento.{/n} «Si estás sol{mf|o|a}... llámanos. Por la presente, Vog'Haik forma parte eternamente de tu sangre».
languages.original_text: {n}The voices fall silent for a brief moment.{/n} "If you find yourself alone... beseech us. Vog'Haik is hereby and forever in your blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las voces guardan silencio por un momento.{/n} «Si estás sol{mf|o|a}... llámanos. Por la presente, Vog'Haik forma parte eternamente de tu sangre».

languages.text: {n}Die Stimmen verstummen einen kurzen Augenblick lang.{/n} "Wenn Ihr allein seid ... ruft uns an. Vog'Haik ist von nun an für immer in Eurem Blut."
languages.original_text: {n}The voices fall silent for a brief moment.{/n} "If you find yourself alone... beseech us. Vog'Haik is hereby and forever in your blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimmen verstummen einen kurzen Augenblick lang.{/n} "Wenn Ihr allein seid ... ruft uns an. Vog'Hige ist von nun an für immer in Eurem Blut."
{n}Die Stimmen verstummen einen kurzen Augenblick lang.{/n} "Wenn Ihr allein seid ... ruft uns an. Vog'Hige ist von nun an für immer in Eurem Blut."

languages.text: {n}Sesler bir anlığına susuyor.{/n} "Kendini yalnız hissedersen... Bize yakar. Vog'Haik burada, ebediyen damarlarında akıyor olacak."
languages.original_text: {n}The voices fall silent for a brief moment.{/n} "If you find yourself alone... beseech us. Vog'Haik is hereby and forever in your blood."
